string-array.name: faqQuestion
string-array.item: Showing blank screen?
Can I delete downloaded file ?
How can I know about all the features of this app?
Can I recover deleted WhatsApp photos?
Bangla messages can not be recovered?
Can I recover Hindi messages?
When will Schedule messages function does not work?
Auto Reply function does not working?
Can WhatsTool app read my deleted messages?
How can I contact customer care?
When I am using Text repeater function my phone was fully stuck?
App does not work properly?

string-array.name: faqAns
string-array.item: Close you application from recent activity and Open again.
Yes! Go to status section and click on "Download" button.\n Click the delete button below the image or video you want to delete.
Go to home section\n Click on the second number icon on the right side of the navigation bar.
No.
Yes! But sometimes it cannot happen.
Yes! You can.
1.If you are using any clone.Then manually you need to choose one for sending sms.\n 2.If screen lock is enable.
You need to give us all the permission what we ask.
No.(Everything store in your phone)
Go to home section.\n Click on settings icon.\n Then click on "Chat with us" button.
If your mobile are stuck then you should not set much value in text repeater "Repeat" section.\n Because your mobile is low performance mobile.
If you face any problem in any function then you can contact us by taking screenshot.
